pallekale jathyanthara bauddha madhyasthana shrawanagarayedi pereda (26) pawathi madhya hamuwakadi ee mahatha me bawa prakasha kaleya.atham bhikshunwahanselada nodannakama nisa yam yam pudgalayanta wiharasthana magin nilame padawi laba dena bawath eewahi kisidu walangu bhawayak nomathi bawath pawasu ee mahatha wyaja nilamewarun nithiya hamuwata paminawima sandaha thama sangamaya idiriyedi piyawara rasak ganna bawath pawasuweya.mema awasthawata diyawadana nilame pradip nilanga dala mahathada samastha lanka basnayaka nilamewarunge sangamaye lekam hanguranketha shri wishnu dewalaye basnayaka nilame sampath priyantha jayasundara, bhandagarika kurunagala paththini dewalaye basnayaka nilame lal hemantha bandara herath yana mahathwaru athulu basnayaka nilamewaru sahabhagi wuha..
